attributes.action: increase the amount of compensation given to our troops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i beleive we should be making more of an effort and movement to support our troops in war zones across the worrld who recieve horrific injurys and in some cases death! i believe the compesation should be increased to help those who come away horrificly injured llive there life as nicely as they can help us help them
